inclusion.criterion: undergoing unilateral retrograde ureteroscopy with planned ureteral stent placement for treatment of urinary tract stones
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Preoperative use of antihistamines, beta-3 agonists, anticholinergics, corticosteroids, and chronic opioid analgesic use
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Preoperative indwelling ureteral stent at the time of treatment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Neurogenic bladder, ureteral stricture, interstitial cystitis, or chronic prostatitis
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Severe renal disease (glomerular filtration rate (GFR) < 10 ml/min or on dialysis)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has neurogenic bladder, but no ureteral stricture. No preoperative indwelling ureteral stent at the time of treatment.
